General.Name: China Fortune Land Development Co Ltd
General.Description: China Fortune Land Development Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, development, construction, and operation of new industrial cities and commercial real estate in China, Indonesia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as China Fortune Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to China Fortune Land Development Co., Ltd. in December 2007. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

5.Name: Mr. Yi  Zhang
5.Title: Member of Supervisory Board & Sr. Professional Director of Department of Legal Affairs
